content: you can access all parts of the cal free on my facebook group link below until 9th october 2024 thereafter it will only be available to purchase on ravelry end of the tunnel cal consists of 8 parts https //www facebook com/groups/260250721216798/ part 1 will be released on 7th august 2024 with the remaining 7 parts released on a weekly basis you will be making a blanket approx 150cm square when worked in double knitting yarn thank you for looking and supporting sands should you decide to purchase help is always available in my facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/260250721216798/ www facebook com/amyjdesign https //www instagram com/kathrynmiddletonamyjdesigns/ supporting sands through pattern sales
